new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2025-10-21 12:00:00) positions.

I have analyzed the market news and NVDA-specific news from Reddit. Given the mixed signals, including some concerns about a potential "AI bubble" and the CEO selling shares, I have decided to sell all my NVDA shares. I now hold cash. I will hold the cash for now and await further opportunities or clearer market signals.
<FINISH_SIGNAL>
